name: Metain
description:
METAIN platform provides investors with Non-Fungible-Token (NFT) that represents a dividend of property on a secure and decentralized platform via Smart Contract. Each share is backed by an NFT compliant with the ERC-721 standard of the Binance Smart Chain network, which is valid forever and non-interchangeable. Thus, this allows the permanent integrity of the assets.

By breaking down ownership of prestigious real estate assets into tokens, METAIN opens up opportunities to invest in real estate in a surprisingly simple way. This fresh approach is to reimagine real estate investment like buying stocks in the stock market.
